* There was no way anyone could know exactly where she was in the 
holoroom...unless they saw her right out and plain.
But that was hard to do...when she was up in the roof.
In a smaller form of her SBM, one where she had to travel on 4 legs instead 
of two. It was easy going.
But just to give a teaser to anyone that might be near...she peeked out and 
looked around.
Clear.
Slipping from the roof she skittered down onto the floor and down the hall a 
bit. Coming close to a large door with huge red letters that spelled: 
RADIOACTIVE!*
